text: @marklevinshow How desperate are you? The coronavirus is NEW!! Never was in 2008!!! Save whatever soul you have left from being coopted by Trump. Pathetic. Oh, and ever heard of HIPAA? Look it up. Hopefully, someone will investigate you for showing this. Not a brain trust, are ya?
